scenes.name: Nick's Arrival
scenes.summary: Nick arrives at West Egg, reflects on Gatsby's parties and his mansion's grandeur.
scenes.firstLine: The silhouette of TEENAGE GATZ, now 16 years old, disappears into the hills...
scenes.lastLine: The whole city packed into automobiles and all weekend, every weekend, ended up at Gatsby's...

characters.name: Nick
characters.quote: Chasing this destiny, a sixteen year old Gatz ran far, far away.

scenes.name: Gatsby's Party Introduction
scenes.summary: Nick attends one of Gatsby's lavish parties for the first time, feeling out of place amidst the opulence and chaos.
scenes.firstLine: An open-topped Rolls Royce motors through Gatsby's gates...
scenes.lastLine: A caravansary of colorful characters surges through the grand entrance.

characters.name: Nick
characters.quote: The whole city packed into automobiles...

scenes.name: Gatsby's Reveal
scenes.summary: Nick discovers the elusive Gatsby's identity during a party when Gatsby personally approaches him.
scenes.firstLine: I thought I might see you here...
scenes.lastLine: Alone, and a little embarrassed, I decided to get... roaring drunk.

characters.name: Nick
characters.quote: I thought I might see you here...

characters.name: Gatsby
characters.quote: No one has ever seen Mr. Gatsby...

scenes.name: Nick and Gatsby's First Meeting
scenes.summary: Gatsby invites Nick over for a private conversation, revealing more about his past and his connections.
scenes.firstLine: This house and everything in it, are all part of an elaborate disguise...
scenes.lastLine: This was his opportunity, and he seized it.

characters.name: Nick
characters.quote: I've been turning over in my mind ever since.

characters.name: Gatsby
characters.quote: Mr. Gatsby doesn't exist.

scenes.name: Daisy's Nervous Tea
scenes.summary: Gatsby and Daisy awkwardly reunite at Nick's bungalow, experiencing a mix of old feelings and current tensions.
scenes.firstLine: Daisy, her back to the door, is still marveling at the flowers. Then she turns. Sees Gatsby. A sharp intake of breath...
scenes.lastLine: Nick pours; and they all sit stiffly, sipping their tea.

characters.name: Gatsby
characters.quote: I'm... certainly glad to see you as well.

characters.name: Daisy
characters.quote: I'm certainly glad to see you again.

characters.name: Nick
characters.quote: Tea?

scenes.name: After the Tea
scenes.summary: The awkward tension continues as Daisy and Gatsby try to reconnect over memories of the past in Gatsby's mansion.
scenes.firstLine: An open-topped Rolls Royce motors through Gatsby's gates...

characters.name: Gatsby
characters.quote: It will be...

characters.name: Daisy
characters.quote: I wish I had done everything on earth with you.

scenes.name: Tension at Nick's Bungalow
scenes.summary: After Nick leaves briefly, Gatsby expresses his concerns to Nick about the meeting being a mistake.
scenes.firstLine: Oh, God! This is a mistake, a terrible, terrible mistake...
scenes.lastLine: He stands, walks to the window and looks out across the bay.

characters.name: Gatsby
characters.quote: Oh, God! This is a mistake, a terrible, terrible mistake...

characters.name: Nick
characters.quote: You're just embarrassed, that's all... Daisy's embarrassed too.

characters.name: Daisy
characters.quote: Look. Its my house. Just there across the bay...

scenes.name: Gatsby's Desperate Plea
scenes.summary: Gatsby pleads with Daisy, as they view his house from across the bay, to start anew with him.
scenes.firstLine: Nick, I want you and Daisy both to see my house. I'd like to show her around.
scenes.lastLine: Daisy joins Gatsby and they step out onto the porch together.

characters.name: Gatsby
characters.quote: Nick, I want you and Daisy both to see my house. I'd like to show her around.

characters.name: Daisy
characters.quote: Where's your place?

characters.name: Nick
characters.quote: Are you sure you want me to come?

scenes.name: Gatsby's Confession
scenes.summary: Gatsby confesses his deep fears and feelings to Nick, revealing his vulnerability about his past and his intense love for Daisy.
scenes.lastLine: She just needs to think. She's going to call in the morning.

characters.name: Gatsby
characters.quote: No. No. No. I'm going to wait. I'll wait all night if necessary.

characters.name: Nick
characters.quote: What's wrong with you!? How could you!?

scenes.name: The Aftermath of Daisy's Decision
scenes.summary: In the wake of Daisy's decision not to be with him, Gatsby is killed, mistaken in his belief that Daisy would leave Tom for him.
scenes.lastLine: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly, into the past.

characters.name: Gatsby
characters.quote: Daisy...

characters.name: Nick
characters.quote: He did not know that it was already behind him...

locations.name: Nick's Bungalow
locations.quote: A unkempt bungalow, hemmed in by enormous mansions. I lived at West Egg... in a forgotten grounds-keeper's cottage squeezed among the mansions of the newly rich.

locations.name: Gatsby's Castle
locations.quote: Gatsby's magnificent castle. Illuminated fountains line a driveway packed with limousines; crowds of glamorous people stream up the broad marble stairs.

characters.quote: When I came back from New York I was disgusted. Disgusted... with everyone, and everything... Only one man was exempt from my disgust.
characters.explanation: A soft shade of green to reflect Nick's role as a reflective observer and mediator, blending neutrality with a touch of growth and freshness.

characters.quote: He was... the single most hopeful person I have ever met... And am ever likely to meet again. There was something about him...
characters.explanation: A cool, deep blue representing Gatsby's depth of feeling, melancholy, and the idealistic dream he holds onto.

characters.quote: Daisy Buchanan. The golden girl. A breathless warmth flowed from her. A promise that there was no one else in the world she so wanted to see.
characters.explanation: A soft, warm peach to symbolize Daisy's romanticism, fragility, and the nostalgia she evokes in others.
